snippet: Viktor F. Vekselberg resigned amid a dispute over whether the world’s largest aluminum company should keep a foothold in other mining ventures.
abstract: Viktor F Vekselberg steps down as chairman of Rusal over a dispute over whether the leading aluminum company should keep a foothold in other mining ventures, rather than focus solely on aluminum.
lead_paragraph: Viktor F. Vekselberg resigned amid a dispute over whether the world’s largest aluminum company should keep a foothold in other mining ventures.

headline.main: Leading Aluminum Company’s Chairman Quits in Dispute
headline.print_headline: Leading Aluminum Company’s Chairman Quits in Dispute
